property.description: Borland & Borland are pleased to present for sale this second floor retirement apartment in favoured location close to Havant town centre and offered with no forward chain.Norfolk House is set in its own communal grounds with resident's parking area. There is a minimum age restriction for owners of 55 years old. The accommodation comprises:Entrance Hallway. Shower Room. Sitting Room. Kitchen and Double Bedroom. Double glazing and electric heating. EPC: C

paragraph.name: Accommodation:
paragraph.text: Communal ground floor entrance. Lift and staircase leading to the second floor landing.

paragraph.name: Entrance Hall:
paragraph.text: Front door. Built in airing cupboard with hot water tank and slatted storage space. Electric meter.

paragraph.name: Sitting Room:
paragraph.text: Double glazed window having display shelf. Dimplex electric heater. Archway to:

paragraph.name: Kitchen:
paragraph.text: Drawer and cupboard base units having roll top work surfaces and tiled surrounds. Range of wall cupboards. Single drainer sink unit with mixer tap. Built in hob, oven and grill.

paragraph.name: Bedroom:
paragraph.text: Measurements taken to the rear of built in double wardrobe cupboard. Double glazed window. Dimplex electric heater.

paragraph.name: Shower Room:
paragraph.text: Shower cubicle having Galaxy Aqua 300 shower unit, tiled surrounds. W.c. Wash hand basin.

paragraph.name: Exterior:
paragraph.text: Norfolk House is a retirement development for the over 55 year olds and has communal garden areas with a residents parking area to the rear. There is also a residents laundry room and lift service to all floors.

paragraph.name: Directions
paragraph.text: From our office proceed to the roundabout on the A259 turning left towards Havant. Following the signs for Havant cross over the two roundabouts and a set of traffic lights. Continue along for approximately half a mile then take a right turn into Bellair Road. Take next right into Oaklands Road, take the next turning on the left where the property will be found AT the corner with resident's parking area at the rear.

N.B. None of the services or appliances have been tested. These property particulars are believed to be materially correct, though their accuracy is not guaranteed and they do not constitute an offer or any part of any contract.
